senses: [{"definition":"Easy of access or approach.","example":"an accessible town or mountain"},{"definition":"(specifically) Built or designed as to be usable by people with disabilities.","example":"accessible public transport"},{"definition":"(of a person) Easy to get along with.","example":null},{"definition":"(followed by to) Open to the influence of.","example":null},{"definition":"Obtainable; to be got at.","example":null},{"definition":"Easily understood or appreciated.","example":null},{"definition":"Capable of being used or seen.","example":null}]
